attributes.action: Scrap The Planned Hike For 4X4 VED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Tax on 4X4 Vehicles is a disgrace!! 4X4 Vehicles pay more already in running costs so we already pay more taxes this combined with the increase at the pumps as well as the DOUBLING of VED is not right!!  A fairer increase could have been reached and we hope that this budgeted IDEA can be reverted to something more reasonable

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=4x4
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
